description: Interact with SingleStore databases using a standardized protocol. Execute queries, describe schemas, and generate ER diagrams effortlessly.

singlestoreHost.description: The hostname of the SingleStore instance.

singlestorePort.description: The port number to connect to SingleStore, usually 3306.

singlestoreDatabase.description: The name of the SingleStore database to connect to.

capabilities.name: generate_er_diagram
capabilities.description: Generate a Mermaid ER diagram of the database schema

capabilities.name: list_tables
capabilities.description: List all tables in the database

capabilities.name: query_table
capabilities.description: Execute a query on a table

capabilities.name: describe_table
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a table

capabilities.name: run_read_query
capabilities.description: Execute a read-only (SELECT) query on the database

capabilities.name: create_table
capabilities.description: Create a new table in the database with specified columns and constraints

capabilities.name: generate_synthetic_data
capabilities.description: Generate and insert synthetic data into an existing table

capabilities.name: optimize_sql
capabilities.description: Analyze a SQL query using PROFILE and provide optimization recommendations
